mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book( pidx, uidx, usetime, cntpeople, option1 )VALUES( #{pidx}, #{uidx}, #{useTime}, #{cntPeople}, #{option1} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE SUBSTRING(usetime,20,16) < now() AND approvalyn = 'Y'

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rnum ,b.* FROM (SELECT bidx ,b.pidx ,b.uidx ,b.bookTime ,b.useTime ,b.cntPeople ,b.option1 ,b.reviewYN ,b.approvalYN ,b.delYN ,p.placeName FROM book b JOIN place p ON b.pidx = p.pidx WHERE p.uidx = #{uidx} AND b.delYN ='N' AND p.delYN ='N' ORDER BY bidx ASC) b, (SELECT @rownum:=0) rnum ORDER BY rnum DESC LIMIT #{start},#{cntPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(bidx) FROM book b JOIN place p ON b.pidx = p.pidx WHERE p.uidx = #{uidx} AND b.delYN ='N' AND p.delYN ='N'
SELECT bidx, pidx, uidx, booktime, usetime, cntpeople, option1, reviewyn, approvalyn, delyn, successbook FROM book WHERE delyn = 'N' AND pidx = #{pidx}
SELECT usetime FROM book WHERE delyn= 'N' AND pidx = #{pidx} AND (usetime >= #{useTime} AND usetime < DATE_ADD(#{useTime}, INTERVAL 24 HOUR))
